dialogue.speaker: Lord Commander
dialogue.text: Welcome, young recruit. I see you've made it through the trials unscathed.

dialogue.speaker: Recruit
dialogue.text: Yes, sir! It was a tough journey, but I'm ready to serve the realm.

dialogue.speaker: Lord Commander
dialogue.text: I'm glad to hear that. Your skills will be put to good use in our quest to vanquish the darkness.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The recruit's eyes widened as he gazed upon the army gathered before him. The fate of the realm rested on their shoulders, and the journey ahead would be fraught with peril.
